message.initial_guidance: If you have already made a transfer, it is possible the network has not yet processed it. The app will periodically check network status and this message will disappear once verified.
message.troubleshooting_guidance: If you are not sure how to proceed, check the help section by clicking the question mark in the top right corner to help diagnose the problem.

message.about_aenc: Aenco is a "one stop shop" for the delivery of cutting edge institutional financing, prime brokerage, and smart capital solutions for the HealthTech industry, as well as a research and collaboration hub for healthcare companies and projects involved in the field of blockchain development. Aenco will be combining its solutions platform and core financing ecosystem with the wider community, through the AEN token, as the key ecosystem building block and extensions across all its service and community deliveries.

label.file_choose: Choose or drag a file here

message.import_bad_file: The file you uploaded is invalid
message.backup_explained: When you click a wallet from the list below, a file will be downloaded to your device. To later restore a given wallet, choose the import from file option during the add wallet procedure.
message.backup_downloading: A JSON file is currently being downloaded to your device. This can be used to restore your wallet later

message.contract_found: The contract has been found, please review details below
message.contract_not_found: The contract could not be found, please check the address and / or network of the managing wallet

message.added: Contact has been added to the address book
message.removal_warning: If you remove this contact from your address book, you will no longer be able to quickly look them up during operations and where applicable, the long form of their address will be used.

message.development_release: This is a development release and should not yet be considered production ready. For wallets on the main net, USE AT YOUR OWN RISK

message.contract_history_not_supported: Transaction history for ERC20 contracts is not currently supported. To view history, please see the managing wallet

action.agree_eula: I agree to the AEN EULA

message.introduction: This is a first community release and should be treated as preview. Please do not use this wallet to store real accounts on. By continuing to use this application, you agree to the AEN Terms and Conditions; certain functionality will be disabled until agreed

message.message_length_exceeded: Max 255 Characters. We'd love to get in contact with you directly

message.introduction: This Smart wallet allows you to generate and manage multiple accounts on the AENChain network, Ethereum Network, Smart Contracts, and Bitcoin networks.
message.instruction:
Before proceeding, you need to have an AEN wallet setup on this device, Please following the instructions
                  below to get started. If you need help at any point, you can click the question icon in the top right of your screen to get both contextual and general help.

message.broadcasting_please_wait: Sending, this may take a minute

message.authenticate_to_continue: You must enter your password to continue
message.authenticate_cancel_question: You cannot proceed without authorisation. If you choose to cancel, all app data will be reset. Are you sure?
message.instructions: Choose from the list below security features you would like to use to protect your wallets
message.profile_remove_confirmation: If you remove the wallet preset, security options and challenges will revert to using the default / global options

message.denominations: By default, the app will try to use the largest denomination available to display token values. If you would like to force display in a set denomination, please choose and option from the dropdown's below for each network.
message.update_frequency: The wallet will routinely synchronise itself with the various blockchain networks. Change settings in this section to alter the time intervals used

label.backup_understand: I have backed up my wallet / understand that keeping it safe is my duty
label.name: Wallet Name

message.add_method: How do you want to setup your wallet?
message.add_success: Your wallet has been successfully setup
message.cannot_exceed_balance: Cannot exceed more than available balance
message.capabilities: With this wallet, you can now receive and transfer tokens using the AENChain network. Before proceeding, we strongly recommend you create a backup of your wallet using the button below.
message.contract_added: Management of the following contract has been added to the wallet
message.blocked_until_transaction: This component will auto-update once a transaction has been made
message.initial_status: At the moment, your wallet is not live on the network. It is necessary to perform a transaction using this address before it has any presence.
message.network_recognise_wallet: The wallet is recognised on the network
message.network_miss_wallet: The wallet is not yet recognised on the network
message.remove_warning: Type in the name of your wallet in the box below and then click delete to proceed. If you remove the wallet, there will be no way to access it unless you have made a backup.
message.transfer_complete: Your transfer has been successfully dispatched to the network
